fields.name: Pardon My Fro Silk Duster
fields.description: Elevate your daily outfits effortlessly with this stylish satin topper, suitable for any occasion - from casual outings to lounging at home. This versatile piece complements all body shapes and serves as the ideal layering essential to showcase your style. Stand out in this luxurious silk duster and experience the compliments rolling in!
fields.bullet_1: Crafted from exquisite non-stretch woven satin, this duster is an embodiment of elegance and versatility. Its vibrant, eye-catching print doesn't just make a statement – it celebrates individuality, empowering you to own your unique story with every swish and sway
fields.bullet_2: The long sleeves provide a touch of sophistication, while the self-fabric tie belt cinches at the waist, offering a flattering silhouette for all body shapes.
fields.bullet_3: Whether tied up for a sleek, polished look or left open for a casual, flowy vibe, this duster adapts to your mood and setting.
fields.bullet_4: The meticulous design features belt loops and inside ties, ensuring a secure closure that moves with you, guaranteeing both style and comfort are never compromised.
fields.bullet_5: The side slits and straight hemline further enhance the duster's effortless drape, offering generous room for movement without sacrificing on style.
fields.care_and_cleaning: Machine Wash
fields.textile_dry_recommendation: Line Dry or Lay Flat to Dry

fields.name: Pardon My Fro Weekender Travel Bag
fields.description: Are you ready to pack up and set out on a fantastic voyage? Then the Pardon My Fro Women Vegan Leather Weekender Squad Travel Bag has got you covered! With its vibrant energy and energetic design, this bag will add an empowering sparkle to your journey. Whether it’s a 3-6 day business trip or a weekend getaway with friends - this spacious and durable bag can comfortably fit it all while making sure your items stay safe and secure. The trusty zipper top closure adorned with gorgeous gold-tone hardware and protective metal feet will keep all your belongings in place. Inside the weekender, you'll also find one interior zipper pocket and two slip pockets, as well as two exterior zipper pockets, perfect for setting up shop anywhere on the go - from beaches to mountains! Let the Pardon My Fro Women Vegan Leather Weekender Squad Travel Bag fuel your wanderlust with its polished style and adventurer feel - so go ahead, start exploring. Your adventure awaits!
fields.bullet_1: Dual rolled handles, gold-tone hardware.
fields.bullet_2: Exterior: top zipper closure, flat bottom with protective metal feet, 2 zipper pockets, stain resistant & water repellent.
fields.bullet_3: Interior: 1 zipper pocket and 2 slip pockets.
fields.bullet_4: Includes a removable, adjustable strap.
fields.bullet_5: TSA Approved for most airlines (exclusions may apply by airline).
fields.care_and_cleaning: Spot or Wipe Clean

fields.name: Pardon My Fro Shower Curtain
fields.description: Expression of personality knows no boundaries! Elevate your bathroom decor with these Pardon My Fro high-quality shower curtains featuring unique prints that will add an original touch to the most intimate room of your house. The beautifully printed design celebrates women who are proud of their hair and their heritage, creating a captivating and empowering ambiance. With these stylish and meaningful curtains, your bathroom will become a haven that reflects your individuality.
fields.bullet_1: Expression of personality has no borders! These quality shower curtains with one-of-a-kind artwork will add an original touch to the most intimate room of one's house.
fields.bullet_2: This curtain features 12 grommet holes at the top to guide the curtain rod, promoting neat and uniform pleat formation. Perfect for easy installation and a polished look in any room.
fields.bullet_3: Fabulously bold digital art print design on one side, sleek white on the other. Rings or rod not included.
fields.bullet_4: Crafted from durable 100% polyester fabric, this washable shower curtain is designed to withstand regular use, ensuring long-lasting quality for your bathroom.
fields.bullet_5: Size up your shower with our 71" x 71" curtain for a perfect fit in standard showers.  Let your style shine in the bathroom!
fields.care_and_cleaning: Machine wash cold, gentle cycle. Do not dry clean. Line dry only. Do not Iron.
fields.textile_dry_recommendation: Line Dry or Lay Flat to Dry

fields.name: Pardon My Fro Plush Fleece Blanket
fields.description: Pardon My Fro embodies the celebration of expressing individuality in a unique and bold way. Stand out from the crowd with this plush and oh-so-cozy fleece throw blanket that not only adds warmth but also adds a touch of style and personality to your space. Embrace comfort and self-expression with this must-have accessory that is perfect for cozy nights in or as a statement piece in your living room.
fields.bullet_1: Crafted from the softest fleece material, it's like being wrapped in a cloud of coziness.
fields.bullet_2: The face features an inspired printed design that speaks volumes of your unique style, while the fluffy white reverse adds an extra layer of warmth and luxury.
fields.bullet_3: Perfectly sized for versatile use, it can easily become your favorite throw blanket for the couch, a faithful companion for those Netflix marathons on the sofa, or even a chic lap blanket to keep you warm as you conquer the world from your bed or home office.
fields.bullet_4: We understand the importance of convenience – our plush fleece blanket is designed to be machine washable, ensuring that care and maintenance are as effortless as its appeal.
fields.bullet_5: It's not just a blanket, but a piece of art that warms the body and the soul, encouraging you to live vivaciously, love fiercely, and express yourself boldly.
fields.care_and_cleaning: Machine wash cold. Tumble dry low or lay flat. Do not iron. Do not bleach.

fields.name: Pardon My Fro Head Wrap
fields.description: At Pardon My Fro, we are not just about hair - We're about celebrating Afro beauty, empowerment, and representation. Inspired by the captivating illustrations of our beloved dolls, we've created headwraps that not only honor the spirit of diversity and individuality but also bring a touch of whimsical charm to your everyday style. Not only does it serve as the perfect head accessory, but it can also be easily knotted and folded for alternative uses. Transform it into a chick body wrap, an elegant shawl, or a trendy belt.
fields.bullet_1: Step into the spotlight with confidence. Our head wraps feature an array of bright and bold colors, coupled with mesmerizing prints that tell a story, your story.
fields.bullet_2: Imagine wrapping your head in a cloud; that’s the unparalleled comfort you’ll experience with our super-soft, breathable, and moisture retaining fabric.
fields.bullet_3: Thanks to our enforced stitching technique, our head wraps ensure a secure hold without slippage, keeping your masterpiece intact.
fields.bullet_4: Designed to keep you cool, comfortable, and fabulous all day long, our head wraps are perfect for every occasion – from a busy day at work to a night out with friends, and even those laid-back at-home days.
fields.bullet_5: Measure 27" x 72" and serve as a versatile fashion statement. Style as a headscarf, hair accessory, beach cover-up, neck scarf, belt, shirt, shawl, handbag accent, sarong cover-up, or neck bow - truly a piece of wearable art.
fields.care_and_cleaning: Hand wash or machine wash warm. Non-chlorine bleach when needed. Tumble dry low. Cool iron if needed.

Not only does it serve as the perfect head accessory, but it can also be easily knotted and folded for alternative uses. Transform it into a chick body wrap, an elegant shawl, or a trendy belt.
fields.bullet_1: Step into the spotlight with confidence. Our head wraps feature an array of bright and bold colors, coupled with mesmerizing prints that tell a story, your story.
fields.bullet_2: Imagine wrapping your head in a cloud; that’s the unparalleled comfort you’ll experience with our super-soft, breathable, and moisture retaining fabric.
fields.bullet_3: Thanks to our enforced stitching technique, our head wraps ensure a secure hold without slippage, keeping your masterpiece intact.
fields.bullet_4: Designed to keep you cool, comfortable, and fabulous all day long, our head wraps are perfect for every occasion – from a busy day at work to a night out with friends, and even those laid-back at-home days.
fields.bullet_5: Measure 27" x 72" and serve as a versatile fashion statement. Style as a headscarf, hair accessory, beach cover-up, neck scarf, belt, shirt, shawl, handbag accent, sarong cover-up, or neck bow - truly a piece of wearable art.
fields.care_and_cleaning: Hand wash or machine wash warm. Non-chlorine bleach when needed. Tumble dry low. Cool iron if needed.

fields.name: Pardon My Fro Chiffon Duster
fields.description: Elevate everyday moments with Pardon My Fro Dusters, the epitome of grace wrapped in the vibrant essence of Afrocentric artistry! A Tapestry of Culture: Each duster is a masterful fusion of design and narrative, paying homage to the rich tapestry of African culture. Wear a story, flaunt a legacy, and let every drape resonate with the rhythm of ancestral beats. Flowy & Fabulous: Experience the magic of flowy silhouettes that gracefully trail behind you. Crafted for those who appreciate comfort without compromising on style, our dusters are the ultimate addition to any outfit, seamlessly transitioning from daytime elegance to nighttime glam. Unapologetic Allure: Dance to your own rhythm, stride with confidence, and let our dusters accentuate every move. Be the vibrant masterpiece amidst monotones, making an unapologetic statement wherever you go.
fields.bullet_1: Non-stretch woven chiffon with printed back
fields.bullet_2: Open front with long, raglan sleeves.
fields.bullet_3: Banded neckline with grommet detail.
fields.bullet_4: Loose-fitting: generously sized for ease of movement and fabric drape.
fields.bullet_5: Straight hemline

fields.name: Pardon My Fro Women's Trench Coat
fields.description: Stay ahead of the fashion curve with Pardon My Fro Trench Coats, where chic meets unparalleled comfort! Our coats encapsulate the art of bold self-expression, enabling you to step out with confidence and flair, making every sidewalk your runway. Drenched in Artistry: Immerse yourself in the striking, artistic prints that breathe life into these exceptional coats. Each design, inspired by the eclectic and vibrant spirit of Afrocentric culture, tells a compelling story of heritage, strength, and elegance. With Pardon My Fro, your outerwear is not just apparel, it's a canvas. Crafted for You: Quality and comfort are non-negotiable. Every trench is meticulously crafted with precision, ensuring not just a garment, but an experience. The fabric whispers against your skin with gentleness, while the sturdy construction promises longevity. It's an investment in your statement style. Stand Out Unapologetically: Why blend in when you were born to stand out? Slip into a Pardon My Fro Trench Coat and let the world see you in all your unparalleled glory. It's more than a coat, it's a celebration of your unyielding spirit and unique identity.
fields.bullet_1: Solid windbreaker fabrication with printed mesh border.
fields.bullet_2: Semi-fitted: somewhat close to the body, but cut for ease of movement and fabric drape.
fields.bullet_3: Lightweight, double-breasted style with gold buttons and belted waistline.
fields.bullet_4: Large, oversized hood and nitch collar
fields.bullet_5: Long sleeves with gold button cuffs
